about Sprintrap, nothing else can kill you. All you have to do is keep 
playing the audio to keep as far away from you as possible and reboot the

happen, taking away from the scare factor. By no means is it a bad game, 
just not as tense or scary as the other two.

+Aurelko Prielozny
that's the whole reason I'm complaining ^^

comments.author: GamerChannelOne

comments.text:
+GamerChannelOne i think its the exact opposite cuz once you get used to it

comments.author: Aurelko Prielozny

comments.text:
+Bloodyravenheart13 I agree. Five Nights At Freddy's 1 you have to close 
the doors and make sure not to use up all your data because there's no way 
you can regain it back, but they also add a few more character's every time 
a new night starts. So that's pretty scary. But they also do that to the 
second game. Five Nights At Freddy's 2, you have to wear the Freddy Faz 
Bear head to trick the old auto mechanics into thinking you're Freddy Faz 
Bear because that'll be the only way they leave you alone. But when they 
started talking about the Fox, he's a new mechanic, so the head won't work 
on him. But he has a second friend with him, so both of them aren't tricked 
by the head, you have to wind up the music box and flash the lights 
simultaneously at them. The little boy laughing and saying "Hi." you have 
to wind up the music box because the lights nor the head would work on him, 
so you have to wind the music box so he'll leave. So I agree with him 
because actually you're more stressed than scared. Sooo, in my opinion, 
FNAF 2 is a lot more stressful.
comments.author: Gabby H

comments.text:
+Bloodyravenheart13
Yeah I would agree when I played this game I was more stressed than scared

top_comment.author: Marceline // candyfrostgirl94

comments.text:
Ohhh, yeah.
I don't find them scary either. But I find the first one terribly creepy 
(music and the characters o.o), the second one complicated (You kind of 
need to remember what's going to fall for what? The toy animatronics fall 
for the mask, the old animatronics fall for the mask if you're super duper 
fast, Foxy, BB and Mangle fall for the light flashing in their faces, 
Puppet doesn't fall for anything, so you have to keep her in the Music Box, 
and Golden Freddy... idk), and the third one has really unnecessary 
jumpscares which warn you: Dude, you're about be jumpscared. Brace yourself.
comments.author: Lily The Dolphin (Aqua)

comments.text:
I find none of them that scary...

captions.text: i(intro music)

Five nights at Freddy's 2.
Are you serious? Again?
No! No-o-o!

No, why, no!
Wait, there's a second one?

Didn't they just make the first one?
So this is the sequel.

I've never ever seen this 
and it looks really creepy.

Never heard of this in my life. It reminds
me of like Slender or something, like, scary.

My one phobia is 
inanimate objects coming to life.

If it's anything like 
Five Nights at Freddy's 1,
then I'm probably going to pee myself.
Okay... I don't know what to expect.

(Reading) Help wanted, 
grand re-opening... why?

(Reading)
Vintage pizzeria given new life.

(Reading) Come be a part of the new face 
of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza.
What could go wrong? Everything.

First night... my hands are already
sweating I don't even know why.

- Ohhh, it looks so different now.
- (phone rings)

Super creepy... so can I get up or...?
Do I just... oh I just sit here?

Oh, so it's like a Chuck E. Cheese.
Do I answer the phone?

- Hello?
- (voice on phone) Hello, hello hello.
What is this?
Oh! No, I didn't want to do that, wait.
It's a mask, okay! (laughs)

(man on phone) Now I want you to forget 
anything you may have heard
about the old location, you know.

It's kinda hard to forget what happened at
the "old location" ...bitch.

(man on phone) 
No new system is without its... kinks.

You're only the second guard to
work at that location.

Uh, the first guy finished his week 
but complained about... conditions.

What guy in their right mind 
would wanna work here?

...mainly his first concern that certain
characters seemed to move around at night.
What?

(man on phone) 
and even attempted to get into his office.

(laughs nervously) 
They come into the office.

(man on phone) While our engineers don't 
really have an explanation for this,
the working theory is that..

the robots were never given a proper night
mode, so when it gets quiet, they think

they're in the wrong room, so then they go
try to find where the people are...

- Oh.. great. greeeat.
- ..and in this case, that's your office.

There's a music box 
over by the prize counter...

- (music box plays) 
- ..and it's rigged to be wound up remotely,

- so just every once in a while--
- Wind up.

switch over to the prize counter video
feed, and wind it up for a few seconds.

You see, there may be 
a minor glitch in the system.

- Something about robots seeing--
- This is scary.

you as an endoskeleton 
without a costume on...
wanting to stuff you into a suit.

So hey, we've given you 
an empty Freddy Fazbear head.

You can put it on any time, and leave it 
on for as long as you want.

Wait.. oh my gosh. 
That's so cool!

You put it on so that 
you can disguise yourself.

You may have noticed there are 
no doors for you to close, heh.
(Laughs) about that...

Even though your flashlight 
can run out of power...

- Oh.
- The building cannot,

so don't worry
about the place going dark.
Well, awesome to know that now.

You should be golden. Uh, check the lights,
put on the Freddy head if you need to...

Keep the music box 
wound up... piece of cake.

Have a good night, 
and I'll talk to you tomorrow.

(Call ends) Wait, I don't get 
what I'm supposed to do though. What?

Okay, what's the- there's like an
attention sign.

Oh- what is that? I got a-
What is that thing blinking?
I'm winding up the music box..

Okay, I'm going to wind up 
the music box really fast,
and then I'm getting out of this camera.
Where's the box?

- (music box plays)
- (gasps) Where? Ohh, okay! Oh okay.

And I have to wind that.. 
up every... so often?

Oh, 'cause they come towards a sound,
so they're not going to come towards me
if i keep that. Okay.

(reading) Press and hold control 
to use flashlight.
I'm so scared!
Oh my god. What is that?
I can't tell what that clown mask is.

So. Ah! Why'd they stop?
Why did it stop?

Wasn't there something standing
next to him? Uhh great.

So they can crawl through those? 
There's no door?!
How am I supposed to keep myself... alive?!
The flashlight is such a good idea.
(crackling noises)
How do I kill him?!

I'm gonna get out now-
What the hell was that?
Literally go away.

(Gasps) Oh my god! 
No, no, no, no, no no!
(breathing quickly)
It's not [bleep] fair!
(gasps) Jesus. (laughs)

Wait, is that coming after me or is it
just like there?
Oh my god.
Oh I forgot, I have a flashlight.
Ah!- oh my- (shouts)
(groans) I hate this game.

Is that like a new bunny tube? Bunny tube-
Oh my god!
Ohhh... why?!

Ah! What do I do?! 
That's what I do, I just...
(buzzing noises)
Looks like a cracked-out Roger Rabbit.
(reading) Let's party.

Like, that literally looks like a slut.
Thank God she's gone.
And this is like the pimp!

- (screaming)
- (shrieks)
That looked like Jigsaw from Saw.
(gasps) Jesus, why are they in the vent?!
So this is going to protect me from him?
Oh my god. (laughs)

Is that it? I'm never going to
go to Chuck E. Cheese again.

I don't understand this game at all. 
It's not like other games where you can

walk, and do things, 
so I'm really confused.

It looks like I'm out of power for my flashlight,
so I don't know what I can do about that.
Oh. Right air vent?

Ooh. Uh. Hi?
(laughs)
Oh! What the f-

Um. Put on the mask?
(laughs)
Oh. fff-
Oh... that was sketchy.

(shouts) I have to wind up the thing
and Freddy Fazbear's looking at me.
New guy! Hey, chickity.
Come closer, come on. Come get-
I have to wind it up. Oh, man.

How does it like do it- does it just- 
do they just stay there, like-?
(cheers) Yeah! That's one.
Got it. 6 AM.
Oh, I made it a whole night. Awesome.
Oh, it's the second night, okay.

- (phone rings)
- Someone's calling me, okay.

- Okay, the guy's talking again.
- Hello? See I told you your first night

wouldn't be a problem. 
You're a natural!

- Did you ever see Foxy the Pirate?
- Yeah, he killed me last game!
Oh yeah, Foxy.

Hey listen, that one was 
always a bit twitchy.
I know, he's a jerk.

I'm not sure if the Freddy head 
trick will work on Foxy.

Just flash your light 
at him from time to time.

Those older models would always get
disoriented with bright light.
Okay, that doesn't sound safe!

It would cause 
a system restart or something.
System restart.

Come to think of it, you might want to try
that on any room where something...

undesirable might be. It might hold 'em in
place for a few seconds.
Gotta give 'em a seizure. That's the goal!
Anyway, I'm sure it won't be a problem.

Have a good night, 
and I'll talk to you tomorrow.

- (laughter)
- Okay, there's creepy children laughing.

The children voices scare me more than
anything, I don't know why!
(laughter)
(Gasps)
(child) Hello.
Is that a kid?
Oh, bunny, yeah!

Oh jeez, the stupid thing, it's like a
weird happy worm, I don't like it!
(gasps) Jesus, why is that there?!
(child) Hi.

Okay, there's a weird
children voice telling me hi.
(gasps) Why is that in the vent?!

- (screaming)
- Jesus!
(Laughs) That was tough!

That scared the Jesus out of me, I don't
like-! (laughs)
Uhm. Flash it? Go away? Please?

Oh my god, there he is!
I have to flash my flashlight.
Go away, go away.

Ahh! See you! Flash you! 
Flash-ing you! Go away!
Please! Just leave. Please.
My flashlight's gonna die because of him.

See I don't get that, 
why is it going down?
It's like a bomb.

- (screaming)
- Ahh!
Oh my god!
I hate this game, why?!

Ah, come on, 
get outta here. Come on.

- I know- Let's party? No, I do not wanna party.
- (child) Hello.
And there's a kid saying hello again.
(music box playing)
Oh my god.

There's footsteps. 
Pretty- They're getting louder.
Oh my god. Whoa.
Uhm.
(child) Hi.

- (screaming)
- Oh my god!

He's not going away... Oh he's away, 
he's gone, he's gone, he's gone.

Okay, now what? Now what do I do?
Oh wait, okay.
Oh my god, oh my god. stop.

- (screaming)
- Ahh! Oh my god.
Okay, that was really creepy and scary.

Still sweating. I definitely liked the
original better.

People complained about the original,
how it was like, oh you're just doing
like, a couple things.

That was what made it
manageable for me!

The second one, there's like a lot more
things to do, and I thought
you know, this one's a lot more fun.
Oh my god, my anxiety levels were really high

and I didn't know what 
was going to happen to me.
I need my inhaler. (laughs)
I've played Outlast, Amnesia...

None of the games have made me just
jumpscare like that, so, very impressive.

Thanks for watching us play 
Five Nights at Freddy's 2,
here on the React Channel.

Comment below what other games
you want us to play next.

Subscribe! New gaming 
comes out every Sunday.
Thumbs up for peeing our pants.
Goodbye! I'm not gonna sleep tonight.
Thank you.

title: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S 2 (Teens React: Gaming)
